meanings.definition: Pertaining to or characteristic of a suffix.
meanings.sent1: The suffixal part of the word comes at the end.
meanings.sent2: In English, many adjectives are suffixal.
meanings.sent3: The suffixal letters at the end make the word longer.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was like a suffixal touch, adding flair to her writing.
meanings.sent5: The suffixal aspect of the word is what gives it its meaning.

meanings.definition: Having the nature of a suffix.
meanings.sent1: The suffixal addition changed the meaning of the word.
meanings.sent2: A suffixal ending can alter the word's function.
meanings.sent3: The suffixal twist at the end surprised everyone.
meanings.sent4: His kindness was a suffixal part of his personality.
meanings.sent5: The suffixal nature of the word made it easy to identify.

meanings.sent1: The suffixal rule dictates how to create new words.
meanings.sent2: Understanding suffixal patterns helps in language learning.
meanings.sent3: The suffixal process can be complex but fascinating.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like a suffixal force driving her forward.
meanings.sent5: The suffixal formation of words is an interesting linguistic phenomenon.
